          <title>
            <string language="en">Diffusion of gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diffusion (Zerstäubung) des Gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diffusion du gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Difusão do gás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diffusione di gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάχυση αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Difusión del gas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the diffusion of hydrogen chloride and ammonia gases. A white band forms where the two gases meet.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diffusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">white band</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Diffusion (Zerstäubung)
Wasserstoffchlorverbindung und -ammoniakder gase. Ein Weißband 
bildet, wo die zwei Gase treffen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la diffusion des gaz de 
chlorure et d'ammoniaque d'hydrogène. Une bande de blanc forme 
où les deux gaz se réunissent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a difusão de gáses do 
cloreto e da amônia de hidrogênio. Uma faixa do branco dá 
forma a onde os dois gáses se encontram com.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la diffusione dei gas 
dell'acido cloridrico e dell'ammoniaca. Una fascia di bianco 
forma dove i due gas vengono a contatto di.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη διάχυση των αερίων 
υδροχλωρίου και αμμωνίας. Μια άσπρη ζώνη διαμορφώνει όπου 
τα δύο αέρια συναντιούνται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la difusión de los 
gases del cloruro y del amoníaco de hidrógeno. Una venda del 
blanco forma donde los dos gases satisfacen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diffusion (Zerstäubung)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserstoffchlorverbindung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">weißes Band</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">diffusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
